    • buildReadPlan

      public static List<Pair<Integer,ValueReader<?>>> buildReadPlan(Types.StructType expected, org.apache.avro.Schema record, List<ValueReader<?>> fieldReaders, Map<Integer,?> idToConstant)
      Builds a read plan for record classes that use planned reads instead of a ResolvingDecoder.
      Parameters:
      expected - expected StructType
      record - Avro record schema
      fieldReaders - list of readers for each field in the Avro record schema
      idToConstant - a map of field ID to constants values
      Returns:
      a read plan that is a list of (position, reader) pairs

    • buildReadPlan

      public static List<Pair<Integer,ValueReader<?>>> buildReadPlan(Types.StructType expected, org.apache.avro.Schema record, List<ValueReader<?>> fieldReaders, Map<Integer,?> idToConstant, BiFunction<Type,Object,Object> convert)
      Builds a read plan for record classes that use planned reads instead of a ResolvingDecoder.
      Parameters:
      expected - expected StructType
      record - Avro record schema
      fieldReaders - list of readers for each field in the Avro record schema
      idToConstant - a map of field ID to constants values
      convert - function to convert from internal classes to the target object model
      Returns:
      a read plan that is a list of (position, reader) pairs
